headline: PepsiCo faces serious challenges in the snack aisle: 3 takeaways
summary: PepsiCo (PEP) is in focus as Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi's Stock of the Day, who cites RBC Capital Markets' three biggest issues with the snack company: its prices, being under-indexed for snack industry growth, and underexposure in the protein landscape. Slatestone Wealth chief market strategist Kenny Polcari — who is also the host of Yahoo Finance's Trader Talk podcast — and Yahoo Finance senior reporters Brooke DiPalma and Ines Ferré assess Pepsi's position in the broader snack space, health trends as consumers navigate inflated food prices, and compare the company's performance to that of its rival Coca-Cola (KO). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: Barclays Downgrades Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. (KDP) from Overweight to Equal Weight, Reduces PT to $26
summary: With significant upside potential, Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. (NASDAQ:KDP) secures a spot on our list of the 12 Best Widow and Orphan Stocks to Buy According to Analysts.
